Sentencas: The use of self-healing glass as hermetic seals is a recent advancement in sealing technology development for the planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A mechanistic-based healing model for self-healing glass seals used in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Because of its capability to restore mechanical properties at elevated temperatures, the self-healing glass seal is expected to provide high reliability in maintaining the long-term structural integrity and functionality of SOFCs.
Titulo: A mechanistic-based healing model for self-healing glass seals used in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To accommodate the design and evaluate the effectiveness of these engineered seals under various thermomechanical operating conditions, a computational modeling framework must be developed to accurately capture and predict the healing behavior of the glass material.
Titulo: A mechanistic-based healing model for self-healing glass seals used in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the present work, a mechanistic-based, two-stage model was developed to study the stress and temperature-dependent crack healing of the self-healing glass materials.
Titulo: A mechanistic-based healing model for self-healing glass seals used in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model initially was first calibrated by experimental measurements combined with kinetic Monte Carlo (kMC) simulation results and then implemented into finite element analysis (FEA).
Titulo: A mechanistic-based healing model for self-healing glass seals used in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of various factors, e.g., stress, temperature, and crack morphology, on the healing behavior of the glass were investigated and discussed.
Titulo: A mechanistic-based healing model for self-healing glass seals used in solid oxide fuel cells
A mechanistic-based healing model for self-healing glass seals used in solid oxide fuel cells
